formattedAddress: 35 W 134th St, New York, NY 10037, USA
adrFormatAddress: 35 W 134th St, New York, NY 10037, USA

originalText.text: I love this gym I grew up in building 40 an I went there as a kid to karate class so it's a great feel when I come to work out as a grown man.the only thing that pissed me off is the other day I went there an some lady was really rude an just did not get off one of the machines even the I would look every now an then to see if she was done.she knew I wanted to get on too an just kept talking on her phone the whole time.other than that it's a peaceful place to workout

originalText.text: As a United States Navy Veteran the interaction from one said staff member is/was giving disrespect. I would like to escalate my complaint based on unprofessionalism and incompetencies. Not sure of her name but it has red locs and sits at the front desk.

originalText.text: Yet another modern NYC service that operates differently in the black community. Also, No showers for men. Female staff randomly enter the women's locker. And of course they close earlier than listed. Modern black+ (other women from minority communities) women running the joint so...expect non accountability, attitude, etc....

originalText.text: Recreation center.  Lots of free activities.  Free karate for kids and adults at Harlem Gojo.  Grandmaster McGee.  Only pay for the cost of uniform.  Shape up NYC events.  Otherwise, Dept of Parks paid membership allows you to use all the other NYC locations.  Children under 18 years =free!

originalText.text: The center manager zakiyah degraffe was as nasty as a person it gets, She is unfit to be the manager for anything. On Monday Dec 19 I came over with my friend to play ping pong. I always bring my lock but my friend who only had a jacket on was told to show a lock but he didn't have one cause he didn't bring a bag. We try to explain how it was a misunderstanding for him not to bring one if we could just put it in my locker or he could probably even keep on the jacket while we play. The manager and her corrupted security guard immediately and aggressively started displaying anger and raised there voices at us as if were were trying to commit a crime. She threatened to cancel our memberships, did not show any type of empathy towards the situation. Her behavior was so out of line that even her staff members gaves us tips in how to report her for that poor treatment we received. This person lacks of social skills and is highly un professional. Sad!!
